thread.title: Rita Ora looks almost unrecognisable as she flaunts striking new look on the Brit Awards 2017 red carpet
thread.title_full: Rita Ora looks almost unrecognisable as she flaunts striking new look on the Brit Awards 2017 red carpet

author: Vicki Newman
title: Rita Ora looks almost unrecognisable as she flaunts striking new look on the Brit Awards 2017 red carpet
text:
Rita Ora looks almost unrecognisable as she flaunts striking new look on the Brit Awards 2017 red carpet The former X Factor judge didn't look her usual self as she hit the red carpet Share Rita Ora (Photo: Rex Features) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Rita Ora showcased a VERY different look as she walked the red carpet at the Brit Awards. 
The former X Factor judge was almost difficult to recognise when she first stepped out at the star-studded event this evening. 
The RIP hitmaker had a very taut appearance and facially, looked very different to the fresh-faced pop star we all know. Rita didn't look like herself (Photo: Rex Features) 
She showed off her slender figure a bejeweled green gown with a sheer bottom that helped flash her long legs. 
Earlier this month, fans were left baffled by her look at the Fifty Shades Darker premiere. 
Rita took to Snapchat earlier in the night to share a selfie alongside the caption: "New look new me". Read More Rita looked very different at the premiere (Photo: PA) She's pictured here in New York City just a few months ago (Photo: Nancy Rivera/Splash News) New look, new me? (Photo: Rita Ora/snapchat) 
Rita, who mentored Louisa Johnson to victory on the ITV talent show in 2015, seems to have changed a lot in the last couple of years. 
She put on quite the display at the premiere in a show-stopping gown. 
The navy halterneck ensemble complimented off her figure beautifully, showing off just a hint of underboob to give it some edge. 
Her high ponytail pulled her hair away from her face and accentuated her high cheek bones. 
But she looks very different to her X Factor days just two years ago. Read More Rita used to be a judge on the X Factor (Photo: Splash) She mentored Louisa Johnson to victory in 2005 (Photo: Splash) 
Rita has reprised her role in the film franchise as Mia, the sister of main character, billionaire businessman Christian Grey. 
She was ridiculed by fans the first time around for only having three lines make it to the final cut of Fifty Shades Of Grey. 
Rita may also spark speculation that she's engaged after sharing an image of herself wearing a huge diamond ring on her wedding finger. 
She posted it to Snapchat with the caption: "Thank you Tiffany's". Is Rita engaged? (Photo: Rita Ora/snapchat) Rita celebrates with Louisa (Photo: Splash) 
The films, which star Dakota Johnson and Jamie Dornan , are based on a series of erotic novels by EL James. 
They follow Anastasia Steele as she embarks on a sexual relationship with the wealthy Christian Grey only to discover that he has some dark desires and the need to control everything.
